wikitext.*:
'''''An Interview with J.R.R.T.''''' is a [[Index:Audio recordings of J.R.R. Tolkien|recorded interview]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] by [[Denys Gueroult]] in January [[1965]].

The title 'An Interview with J.R.R.T.' comes from a transcription of the interview published in [[Minas Tirith Evening-Star (Volume 8, Number 2)|''Minas Tirith Evening-Star'' (Volume 8, Number 2)]]. The edited interview was first broadcast in January [[1971]] as part of the [[BBC]] Radio 4 book review programme ''Now Read On''.

Parts of the interview that were edited out from the broadcast were published in Zak Cramer's article "Jewish Influences in Middle-earth" (''[[Mallorn 44]]'').
